mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT CR.COURSE_ID, CR.COURSE_REVIEW_ID, CR.REVIEW_CONTENT, CR.USER_ID, RI.IMAGE_PATH FROM TBL_COURSE_REVIEW CR LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_REVIEW_IMG RI ON CR.COURSE_REVIEW_ID = RI.COURSE_REVIEW_ID) R LEFT OUTER JOIN TBL_USER U ON R.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE R.COURSE_ID = #{courseId}
